summary: The script orchestrates the evaluation of a spoken language understanding (SLU) model for intent classification and slot filling. It loads a trained model configuration, runs inference on a specified dataset, computes evaluation metrics using a dedicated SLU evaluator, formats the results, and optionally saves them to a JSON file.
business_intent: To measure and report the accuracy of speech intent and slot detection models, enabling continuous improvement of voice-driven applications and ensuring reliable user interactions.
